thread.title: Twitter and Dorsey: What’s Old Isn’t New Again
thread.title_full: Twitter and Dorsey: What’s Old Isn’t New Again - WSJ

author: Miriam Gottfried
title: Twitter and Dorsey: What’s Old Isn’t New Again
text:
When a company’s stock halves in a year, it is a pretty clear sign that it is in need of a shake-up. That doesn’t seem to be what Twitter is getting.
The micromessaging service’s board named co-founder and interim chief Jack Dorsey as permanent chief executive on Monday. This follows a search to replace former chief Dick Costolo, who left at the... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
